shortDescription: Theme: Future Vision. Modern, tech-inspired Ganesh mandap.
description: A futuristic mandap with interactive displays and smart lighting.

shortDescription: Theme: Golden Era. Luxurious gold-themed decor.
description: A lavish golden mandap with shimmering drapes and ornate details.

shortDescription: Theme: Spiritual Harmony. Fusion of different cultures.
description: A mandap blending elements from various Indian cultures, promoting harmony.

shortDescription: Theme: Heritage. Showcasing traditional Maharashtrian art.
description: Mandap decorated with Paithani sarees and Warli art, celebrating local heritage.

shortDescription: Theme: Rainbow Unity. Celebrating diversity and togetherness.
description: A rainbow-colored mandap symbolizing unity and hope after the pandemic.

shortDescription: Theme: Digital Ganesh. Virtual celebrations during lockdown.
description: A unique digital-themed mandap with LED screens and online darshan for devotees.
Decorations made from recycled materials and plants, promoting environmental awareness.

shortDescription: Theme: Royal Palace. Majestic and grand Ganesh mandap.
description: A palace-inspired setup with golden accents and regal drapes, creating a royal ambiance.

shortDescription: Theme: Peacock Splendor. A colorful peacock-inspired decor.
description: Peacock feathers and vibrant colors adorned the mandap, representing beauty and grace.

shortDescription: Theme: Lotus Mandap. A floral celebration of Ganesh Chaturthi.
description: A vibrant lotus-themed mandap with intricate floral decorations, symbolizing purity and devotion.
